import './App.css'; import axios from 'axios' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Spinner from '../src/component/ui/Spinner' import SearchForm from '../src/component/search-form/SearchForm' import usePokemonStore from '../src/store/pokemon/pokemon-store' function App() { const { pokemons, isLoading } = usePokemonStore() return (

Lista de Pokemons

{ isLoading ? : <>
    { pokemons.sort((a, b) => a.name > b.name ? 1 : -1).map((pokemon, index) => { return (

  • {pokemon.name}

    • ) }) }
}
); } export default App;
